article: Unexpected things may happen every day but no one can tell when and where. People usually get surprised or frightened by such things. One day I  _  a taxi to go to a meeting. As it came near the corner, the taxi stopped suddenly.The  _  got out looking very puzzled . A big  _  which had been following the taxi stopped, too. The taxi driver was now  _  at the corner looking up  _  the sky and the truck driver got out and  _  him. A number of cars behind them were  _  to stop as well and a large crowd of people had  _  at the corner. The cause of all this  _  was a very strange noise. It  _  as if thousands and thousands of  _  were chirping .The sound of so  _  birds toghter was quite surprising and many people looked  _  . The most extraordinary thing was that,except one or two  _  , there was not a bird in  _  . No one was able to know why --  _  two policemen arrived on the scene. They walked all around the area for a while and then went over near the railroad tracks beside a big board advertisement for a  _  . Since the noise seemed to be coming from around there, they climbed up and found that two loudspeakers had been  _  behind the advertisement.The bird noises were being broadcast to  _  attention to the film advertisement. The cinema that made this advertisement was  _  to take the loudspeakers away, because they caused trouble and people were tired of them.
